titles: This is onely to goe amongst friends.
author: Howgill, Francis, 1618-1669.
Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662. To the camp of the Lord in England.
publisher: Printed for Thomas Simmons, at the signe of the Bull and Mouth near Aldersgate.,
notes: With a second caption title page 15: To the camp of the Lord in England - signed on page 23: Edward Burrough.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb: 16: 1655"; also in the colophon the last number of the imprint date has been marked through and "1655" written below.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Society of Friends --  Apologetic works --  Early works to 1800.
